name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, the Hangzhou Dianzi University Confession Wall posted a message about "Don't forget Peng Zaizhou"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 27, parents went to the school gate to defend their rights. On the same day, students from Hengyang No. 1 Middle School put up a sign at the entrance of the Education Bureau to express their grievances for the student who jumped off the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Unlike Li Jiaqi, as of now, the accounts of Yu Minhong and Oriental Selection have not been affected by the "June 4th" incident. Many media have also reprinted and reported on other live broadcast clips of Li Shufu and Yu Minhong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, the Sitong Bridge slogan appeared again on the campus of Hangzhou Dianzi University

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, in Tianshui City, Gansu Province, the owners of unfinished buildings came to the People's Government of Gangu County to protest and defend their rights, but were driven away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, in Datong City, Shanxi Province, the Henghe Shijia project had been left unfinished for ten years and the developer had sold the same house to multiple buyers. The owners gathered at the Wohuwan Sub-district Office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 28, Yancheng, Jiangsu. Some elderly people could not withdraw their pension money from Ping An Bank in Yancheng, so they came to the bank to defend their rights.
It is said that they have not been able to withdraw a penny of their money in the past three months, and the bank leaders have been delaying the time and not solving the problem. One of the depositors has a family member who has cancer and has no money to see a doctor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 28, Zhangjiajie, Hunan. It was reported online that because the Zhangjiajie Agricultural Bureau did not allow farmers to stir-fry tea themselves, the tea-making machine was sealed by the local Agricultural Bureau.
In response, the Agricultural Bureau stated that berry tea is a key development project in the local area. In order to achieve standardized production, small workshops were closed, and the certification matters will be implemented later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 28, a leak in a liquefied gas tank in a resident's home in Dashiqiao City, Liaoning Province caused an explosion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, a fire broke out at the Meishan Xianger Chemical Plant

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is said online that on the evening of March 28, a shooting occurred at the back door of the Suzhou TNT Bar Royal Wynn, and someone died.
Currently, no relevant news can be found, but there are many local people discussing it in WeChat Moments and on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Enter with caution][Enter with caution]
On the morning of March 29, a stabbing incident occurred in Xiadian, Gulou District, Xuzhou City
The murderer stabbed the victim and then committed suicide in public.
According to online information, the murderer was detained a month ago and was released today. It is suspected that this was a targeted act of revenge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 29, Hengshui, Hebei. Taihua Lijingfuyuan has been unfinished for many years and the owners went to the county government to protest and defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 9 am on March 29, a car hit a pedestrian in Xinfeng County, Ganzhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of March 29, a car hit a pedestrian in Xian County, Cangzhou City, Hebei Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of 3 p.m., the accident caused 2 deaths and 3 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 29, a large number of people gathered in Zhongnan City, Yancheng to collect debts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another video said that the murderer changed multiple knives during the slashing process.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, on the 29th, the men's restroom in Building 114 of Building 6 was blocked off and a sign saying "Under Maintenance" was hung. A notice saying "Please Move to Other Floors" was also posted, with a seal from the Hangzhou Dianzi University Security Department on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, a man on Renmin Road in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, denounced officials for corruption and bribery, which caused huge losses to the government and the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: Tanker on fire

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics issued a notice requiring each college to create a "red class."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the same time, Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics issued an official notice to reduce the democratic voting component within the Communist Youth League and prohibit the use of democratic voting as the final result of the selection of "Excellent League and Excellent Cadres". Instead, the completion rate of the Youth University will be used as the standard. 
And remind students not to use the campus network to bypass the firewall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequently, the Hangzhou Dianzi University confession wall was banned
